title: Chrystia Freeland: ‘Ball Is In Putin’s Court’
description: Chrystia Freeland, former Canadian Deputy Prime Minister and current economic adviser to Ukrainian President Zelenskiy, speaks with David Westin from Davos about negotiations over the war in Ukraine. She discusses potential investment opportunities in Ukraine, and explains why the latest scuffle over Greenland was a “wake up call for Europe.” (Source: Bloomberg)
